markdownRemark.html: This museum was named after the cannons that appear between the battlements at the top. This 16th century building, located in the Realejo district, stands out for its imposing façade with the five Greek gods. It currently houses the History Museum of Granada with permanent exhibitions about the city over the centuries.

frontmatter.title: Museo de Casa de los Tiros
frontmatter.description: Museo de Casa de los Tiros - This museum was named after the cannons that appear between the battlements at the top. This 16th century building, located in the Realejo district, stands out for its imposing façade with the five Greek gods. It currently houses the History Museum of Granada with permanent exhibitions about the city over the centuries.
frontmatter.price: Citizens of the EU go free, other countries pay 1.50 euro entry.
